dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's facial expression appears neutral while discussing an exciting topic.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Work on aligning facial expressions with the excitement of the topic.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses 'this' without pointing to anything specific.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Use hand gestures to point out specific examples.
Practice maintaining a steady pace to avoid awkward pauses.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses filler words like 'um' and 'like'.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Avoid filler words to improve clarity.
Reduce fidgeting to maintain a more professional appearance.

dissonanceFlags.description: Some words are unclear or mumbled.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Ensure clear pronunciation to avoid mumbled words.

strengths: Clear speech with minimal filler words
priorities: Match facial expressions to your words

transcript.text: hi i'm ramese a solo founder of tactical ai i'm
building ai powered tactical analysis for soccer teams i've been
passionate about soccer since early childhood playing competitively back home
in my country before coming to united states for studies
since early twenty twenty five i've been working part time
with my college soccer team and i noticed that coaches
spend hours and hours on reviewing the past game footages
to find the patterns and prepare their team for the
upcoming games i'm building a tool that allows teams to
upload the video of the match and with help of
machine learning we extract the data about speed distance formation
etcetera then we pass this data to llm to provide
the contextual feedback and advices for the coach mvp is
done we are launching next week with two pilot teams
this is my childhood dream being a tech founder who
solves a real world problems thank you

geminiReport.coachingAdvice:
The presentation demonstrated a well-paced delivery, minimal use of filler words, and consistently composed body language. The speaker also maintained generally good eye contact throughout.

While generally effective, eye contact requires more consistent application across the entire presentation. A significant area for development was the observable disconnect between verbal expression and facial cues, particularly when conveying enthusiasm with an anxious expression. Furthermore, opportunities were missed to visually reinforce key points, such as referring to data without a corresponding on-screen gesture.

To enhance engagement and consistency, practice the 'triangle technique' by varying your gaze between the camera and points to its left and right. Additionally, rehearse in front of a mirror, consciously matching your facial expressions to the emotional content of your words to ensure authentic delivery.
geminiReport.headline: Clear and articulate speaker
